title: Email Alert
body:
I keep receiving an email notifying me of my account(s), it says I have an account on the Eu Nordic and East servers with my email, which isn't something I've done nor have requested to be notified. 

I've not clicked on anything in the email, nor understand why I'm getting it, but it does make me wonder how an account on the EU servers got set up with my email addy.

Should I be worried about this? Email associated with the account is the one I only use for my games so not much can be gotten from it, I just don't wanna have something happen to my account cause of whatever is going on there.

Edit 1: Just did a lolking search of the summoner name and it appears to be a lvl 30 account that hasn't been played in about 7 months, none the less, its something that shouldn't be there and isnt mine....guess I'm gonna have to find a way to just get that entire part of the account deleted

replies.body: Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can take a look into this and find out what's going on.  In the meantime, we have an Emails From Riot guide that can help fight against possible phishing attempts.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
